enchantment.rearm.backstep.desc: Press the Action key shortly after shooting an enemy to perform a backwards dash.
enchantment.rearm.crippling_throw.desc: Allows throwing the axe to slow down enemies and recalling it to deal bleeding damage with the Action key.
enchantment.rearm.magic_protection.desc: High resistance to magic damage sources.
rearm.config.bow.enablePerfectShot.desc: Arrows fired from bows will deal increased damage if they are fired shortly after fully charging the bow. Disables vanilla random arrow critical damage.
rearm.config.bow.enableBackstep.desc: Press the action key shortly after shooting an enemy with a bow enchanted with Backstep to perform a backwards dash.
rearm.config.bow.improvedMultishot.desc: Changes Multishot to have 3 levels with each level increasing the amount of additional arrows fired.
rearm.config.crossbow.improvedPiercing.d: Allows Piercing to ignore a percentage of the enemies armor based on level.
rearm.config.crossbow.fixedArrowDamage.d: Arrows fired from crossbows will deal consistent damage instead of a variable amount.
rearm.config.sword.enableCriticalCounter: Sword attacks made shortly after blocking with a shield will critically strike. Disables vanilla sword critical strikes.
Increases the damage of the sweeping attack based on the amount of enemies hit and level. Also increases the range of the sweeping attack based on level.
rearm.config.sword.sweepingEdgeAdditiona: Additional damage per mob per level
rearm.config.axe.cripplingThrow.desc: Allows throwing the axe at an enemy using the action key. The axe will remain inside the enemy and slow them. Pressing the action key again recalls the axe and the enemy starts taking bleeding damage.
Changes Protection to only work against physical damage and renames it to Melee Protection.
rearm.config.protection.elementalProtect: Changes Fire Protection to work against lightning and freeze damage on top of fire damage and renames it to Elemental Protection.
Adds a new armor enchantment that protects against magic damage.
rearm.config.protection.allowMultiplePro: Allows multiple different types of protection enchantments on the same item.
rearm.config.protection.maxProtectionEnc: Set the maximum allowed amount of different protection types on the same item.
rearm.config.tweaks.craftTippedArrowsWit: Changes the tipped arrow recipe to use regular potions instead of lingering ones.
rearm.config.tweaks.infinityFix.desc: Makes bows and crossbows enchanted with Infinity not require having an arrow in the inventory.
